Now I'd like to highlight a few of my colleagues who have made outstanding contributions in alignment to our core values.", '
So, before finishing up, I want to highlight that IDC recently published six reports covering areas of business spend management and Coupa was once again the leader in every one of them.', '
So let me close where I began, this year presented more challenges for all of us than we could have possibly imagined, but there is nothing more human than resiliency in the face of adversity.', "
During the year, we continued to invest across our organization and to the success of our customers and we made strategic investments with the acquisitions of Kinaxis, BELLIN, Much-Net, and LLamasoft during fiscal '21 and our most recent acquisition of Pana in early February.", '
In fact, even with the economic headwinds and the impact from our acquisitions, we executed well and still generated an adjusted free cash flow margin of 21%, up from 14% last year and we exited the year from a Rule of 40 perspective at 60% and we define the Rule of 40 as revenue growth rate plus adjusted free cash flow margin.', '
Calculated billings for Q4 were $270 million, up 49% year-over-year and $642 million for the full year, up 37% compared to last year.', '
Turning to gross margin.', '
Specifically, we delivered Q4 non-GAAP operating income of $11 million or 7% of total revenue as well as non-GAAP net income of $13 million or $0.', '
Please note that our Q4 operating cash flows were negatively impacted by one-time $19.', "
Next, our guidance once again assumes no billings or revenue contribution in Q1 or fiscal '22 from Coupa Travel Saver.", '
As a reminder, we report on-prem license revenue in our professional services and other revenue line.', '
Finally, the opening deferred revenue haircut for LLamasoft was significant, nearly 50% as I noted earlier.', '
Moving down the income statement, we expect a Q1 non-GAAP gross margin of 65% to 66%.', '
After finishing the year strong with $38.', "
Turning to gross margin, for fiscal '22, we expect a non-GAAP gross margin of 66% to 67%, a non-GAAP operating loss of $7 million to $10 million and a non-GAAP net loss of $17 million to $20 million resulting in a non-GAAP loss per share of $0.", '

Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for standing by, and [Inaudible 2020 third-quarter financial results conference call.', '
Most of our businesses were shut down, and this had a huge impact on our third-quarter results.', "
Since our last earnings call, we've begun a responsible phased reopening of our parks in Shanghai, Paris, Tokyo, and Orlando as well as our shopping and dining area, Downtown Disney in Anaheim.", '
This is a significant milestone and a reaffirmation of our strategy for growth.', "
Like many companies, we've had to find innovative ways to conduct our business during the pandemic.", "
With that, I'll turn it over to Christine.", '
We estimate the adverse impact of COVID-19-related disruption on our third quarter segment operating income was approximately $3 billion, net of cost mitigations.', '
As we reopened many of our businesses, we have incurred and will continue to incur additional costs related to addressing the safety of our cast members, talent and guests as well as various government regulations.', '
At parks, experiences, and products, third quarter results largely reflect the closures of our domestic parks and resorts, cruise line business and Disneyland Paris for the entirety of the quarter.', '
These results also reflect an adverse impact at our consumer products business due to the effects of COVID-19.', '
At Studio Entertainment, operating income decreased in the quarter as higher TV SVOD distribution results, lower home entertainment marketing costs, and lower film impairments were more than offset by lower theatrical distribution results.', '
Higher TV SVOD results were driven by content sales to Disney+, including library titles, Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, and Onward, partially offset by a decrease in sales to third parties in the pay window.', '
These increases were partially offset by lower advertising revenue.', '
Total broadcasting ad revenue was down 17% in the quarter, driven by decreases at our owned television stations and the ABC Network.', '
At ESPN, lower programming and production costs were largely due to the deferral of rights costs for the NBA and Major League Baseball.', "
Assuming the resumption of live sports continues as planned, we expect ESPN's ad sales in Q4, including the benefit of the 53rd week, to benefit significantly, particularly from the NBA.", '
During the third quarter, we launched Disney+ in India via our Disney+ Hotstar service, and France via a strategic partnership with Canal, and in Japan via a limited launch with NTT DOCOMO.', '
Results at our direct-to-consumer businesses had an adverse impact on the year-over-year change in segment operating income of about $200 million, which came in better than the guidance we provided last quarter, primarily due to the better-than-expected results at Disney+ and Hulu.', '
Additional detail can be found in our 10-Q, which we expect to file shortly.', "
Consolidating Hulu's operating losses and netting out intersegment eliminations resulted in a positive contribution to total segment operating income of about $490 million.", '
We ended the quarter with $23 billion in cash and continue to feel we are well positioned to navigate through this time of uncertainty and continue to invest in the long-term future growth of our businesses.', "
At parks, experiences, and products, it's worth noting that while Walt Disney World is operating at a positive net contribution level, the upside we are seeing from reopening is less than we'd originally expected given the recent surge in COVID-19 cases in Florida.", "
And with that, I'll turn the call over to Lowell, and we will be happy to take your questions.", '

Jay Luly, president and CEO.', '
Enanta has a successful and proven history of discovering and developing antiviral treatment, as demonstrated by glecaprevir, the HCV protease inhibitor component and MAVYRET, a leading treatment for chronic hepatitis C virus.', '
Our most advanced RSV program is our N-protein inhibitor, EDP-938, which has fast track designation and is currently in three phase 2 studies in multiple patient populations.', '
We are excited by the potential of EDP-938, which is a potent inhibitor of the RSV N-protein that has shown robust clinical data in a phase 2a challenge study, where it was not only safe and well tolerated, but also demonstrated significant effects on viral load and reduced symptoms of infection.', '
We are on track to report top line data from RSP next quarter.', '
These studies, which were initiated after RSVP, are expected to extend at least end of 2023.', '
Preclinical data demonstrated nanomolar potency across the major RSV subtypes, RSV-A and RSV-B and good absorption and plasma exposure across multiple different species.', '
Turning to SARS-CoV-2.', '
In preclinical studies, EDP-235 demonstrated highly potent antiviral activity against SARS-CoV-2 and pharmacokinetic properties supporting a once-a-daily oral dosing regimen without the need for a boosting agent, such as ritonavir, all which indicates the potential of EDP-235 as a best-in-class compound.', '
Like with RSV, there are a number of vulnerable populations, including children, the elderly, adults with underlying pulmonary disease, and those who are immune compromised.', '
EDP-514, our HBV core inhibitor with fast track designation, has been evaluated in two phase 1b studies in different chronic HBV patient population.', "
Before moving to the financials, I'd like to wrap up by reiterating our upcoming milestones.", '
Finally, we look forward to initiating a phase 1 study for EDP-323, our RSV L-inhibitor and nominating a human metapneumovirus clinical candidate in the second half of this year.', '

Moving now to CX-2029 targeting CD71, which is being studied in four expansion cohorts, building on our previously reported Phase 1 dose escalation study where we observe promising clinical signals in squamous, non-small cell lung cancer and squamous head and neck cancer.', "
Now let's take a few moments to highlight the potential opportunity to CX-2029 in these tumor types.", '
Median survival for squamous head and neck cancer patients with metastatic relapse is under one year and new treatments are urgently needed.', '
I would now like to move to earlier CytomX programs and new applications of our versatile technology starting with CX-904, our first conditionally activated T-cell bispecific antibody.', '
Anti-EGFR antibodies are approved in only a limited set of cancer types, yet EGFR is expressed in five of the 10 highest incidence cancers and remains a target of high interest for the development of new biologics.', '
We have previously presented preclinical data from CytomX showing that our conditional activation technology has the potential to improve the therapeutic window of an EGFR CD3 T-cell engager and we are on track to submit an IND for CX-904, a duel-masked bispecific to the FDA before the end of this year.', '
As we previously announced, preclinical characterization and improved therapeutic index of the dual-masked interferon alpha-2b will be presented next weekend at SITC in Washington DC.', '

Welcome to US Bancorp's Fourth Quarter 2020 Earnings Conference Call.", '
I will now turn the conference call over to Jen Thompson, Director of Investor Relations and Economic Analysis for US Bancorp.', "
While uncertainty remains, I'm encouraged by economic data that have generally been coming in better than expected in recent months and an improving economic outlook, given progress on the vaccine and the potential for additional government stimulus.", "
In the fourth quarter, we saw a continuation of improving sales trends in our own payments data with the exception of some pressure on our Merchant Acquiring businesses' European operations, which was affected by the economic shutdown in the second half of the quarter.", '
Non-interest expenses were stable compared with the third quarter and we continue to target flat sequential expense levels as long as revenue growth remains challenging.', "
Now let me turn the call over to Terry, who'll provide more color on the quarter.", '
Terrance R.', '
Turning to Slide 10, exposures to certain at-risk segments, given the current environment, are stable compared with the third quarter.', '
Slide 11 provides an earnings summary.', '
Slide 14 highlights trends in non-interest income.', '
Slide 15 provides information about our payment services business lines, including exposures to impacted industries.', '
Merchant acquiring volumes were negatively impacted by the mix of sales volumes and a decline in spending activity in Europe, following an increased economic shutdowns related to COVID-19.', '
Turning to Slide 16, on a linked quarter basis, non-interest expenses were stable as expected.', '
Slide 17 highlights our capital position.', '
We expect mortgage revenue to decline on a linked-quarter basis, in line with the industry as refinancing activity continues to moderate.', '
The recovery of travel and hospitality spend will be dependent upon the timing and efficacy of vaccinations and changes in consumer behavior and business activities.', '
We expect non-interest expenses to be relatively stable compared with the fourth quarter.', '
We expect the allowance for credit losses to begin to decline when there is more certainty regarding the economic outlook and the timing of when peak net charge-offs will occur.', '
We continue to carefully manage operating expenses while our scale, our innovative culture and our focus on optimization will allow us to invest in our businesses and our digital and payments capabilities.', '
I want to thank our employees for all the resiliency, flexibility and hard work over this past year and for all they do to bring our culture to life every day.', '

Thank you everybody for joining us today on our fourth quarter conference call.', "
I'm also very excited to have announced Korey Kohl to lead our Middleby Beverage Group and Najib Maalouf to lead our residential kitchen equipment business.", '
The Beverage Group and our residential kitchen equipment business have expanded rapidly since their inception and present exciting continued growth opportunities for Middleby.', "
As I'm sure most of you have also seen Dave Brewer recently announced his plans to retire at the end of this year.", '
And lastly, I would like to once again thank our entire Middleby team around the world.', '
As we look back at 2020, I am proud of what we accomplished.', '
Despite the impact of COVID, we remain committed to our long-term strategy as we invested in the reinvention of our business.', "
We've bolstered our capital structure, enabling us to reengage our acquisition strategy and completed acquisitions to further extend our beverage business, add to our portfolio of innovative technologies and expand our global manufacturing capabilities.", '
In 2020 we also continued to execute upon important initiatives to improve our profitability as we emerged from COVID.', '
At our residential business, new home starts and existing home sales continued to be robust while increased time spent at home is resulting in kitchen remodels.', '
In summary, we are proud of the team that successfully navigated the challenges of the past year and we are confident the actions taken have successfully positioned us for the year ahead and toward our vision for the future.', '
Operationally, it was a strong quarter for us.', '
Now jumping into revenues and segment performance.', '
Total Company adjusted EBITDA was $145 million and represented over 20% of revenues, which was also generally in line with Q3.', '
In Residential we saw revenue up 15% as strong demand persists for our premium appliances and outdoor cooking platform.', '
In the quarter, we did take a charge which is a component of impairments shown on the income statement for the sale of our fired earth tile business which contributed around $20 million of revenues in 2020.', '
In Food Processing, revenues increased approximately 9% sequentially and were almost flat organically compared to the prior year.', '
Interest expense is nearly $23 million.', '
So as I mentioned earlier, for the quarter, we generated strong cash flows, $209 million from operations with $70 million in benefit from reduced working capital levels from inventory and other cash management efforts.', '
During Q4, we paid down debt by $109 million and over the full year we have reduced our net debt level by $203 million.', '
As with all parts of the business, 2020 was a dynamic year from us -- for us from a treasury perspective.', '
During the year we also bought back over $85 million of stock, we made acquisitions and investments with a total value over $100 million which included $86 million in cash in $16 million in equity issuances.', '
Craft brewing is another area of growth for us.', '
So even though while I am the one enjoying the outputs, my family has not been entirely left out of the equation.', '
In terms of margins, we do expect to see sequential improvements from Q4 levels and should be at similar levels to prior-year profitability in terms of EBITDA percentages.', "
Residential's growth continues with Q4 order rates up over 50% from the prior year.", '
For Food Processing, we entered 2020 with a record backlog and are pleased given the disruption that impacted this segment during the year to have exited the year at a relatively similar level.', '
Margins are typically rather depressed in the beginning of the year.', '

Our merchandise inventory at the end of fiscal 2021 was up 7.', '
Our inventory is very fresh, and we are operating with considerably less clearance inventory than we have historically.', '
For the full year, we opened five new stores and closed four stores, including the two relocations bringing us to a year-end store count of 431 stores.', '
The combination of sales growth, merchandise margin expansion and improved cost structure allowed us to generate substantial operating cash flow of $115.', '
We ended fiscal 2021 with zero borrowings under our credit facility and a cash balance of $97.', "
While guidance expectations are lower than the prior year's record first quarter results, our guidance range reflects first quarter earnings that would be near or above any pre-pandemic first quarter earnings in our history.", '
The strength of our company is the strength of our team, and I want to take this opportunity to acknowledge and thank our Big 5 team for the phenomenal manner in which they have stepped up and dealt with the many challenges that the pandemic has presented.', '
